verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H9201><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am dwelling <S%H3427><s%> in a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedar, <S%H730><s%> but the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is under <S%H8478><s%> curtains. <S%H3407><s%>"
Then Nathan <S%H5416><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> "Do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that is in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> is with you."
And it came <S%H1961><s%> about the same <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Go <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> My servant, <S%H5650><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "You shall not build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for Me to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in;

for I have not dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in a house <S%H1004><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought <S%H5927><s%> up Israel <S%H3478><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> but I have gone <S%H1961><s%> from tent <S%H168><s%> to tent <S%H168><s%> and from [one] dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place <S%H4908><s%> [to another.]

"In all <S%H3605><s%> places where <S%H834><s%> I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> with any <S%H259><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to shepherd <S%H7462><s%> My people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Why <S%H4100><s%> have you not built <S%H1129><s%> for Me a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>?'"'

"Now, <S%H6258><s%> therefore, thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you say <S%H559><s%> to My servant <S%H5650><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "I took <S%H3947><s%> you from the pasture, <S%H5116><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> that you should be leader <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"And I have been <S%H1961><s%> with you wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have gone, <S%H1980><s%> and have cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> like the name <S%H8034><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> ones <S%H1419><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And I will appoint <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will plant <S%H5193><s%> them, that they may dwell <S%H7931><s%> in their own place <S%H8478><s%> and be moved <S%H7264><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more; <S%H5750><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the wicked <S%H9390><s%> <S%H1121><s%> waste <S%H1086><s%> them anymore <S%H3254><s%> as formerly, <S%H7223><s%>

even from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> [to be] over <S%H5921><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> And I will subdue <S%H3665><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies. <S%H340><s%> Moreover, I tell <S%H5046><s%> you that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for you.

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> that you must go <S%H1980><s%> [to be] with your fathers, that I will set <S%H1><s%> up [one of] your descendants <S%H6965><s%> after <S%H2233><s%> you, who <S%H310><s%> shall be of your sons; <S%H834><s%> and I will establish <S%H1121><s%> his kingdom. <S%H3559><s%>
"He shall build <S%H1129><s%> for Me a house, <S%H1004><s%> and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"I will be his father, and he shall be My son; <S%H1><s%> and I will not take <S%H1121><s%> My lovingkindness <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H2617><s%> from him, as I took <S%H5493><s%> it from him who <S%H5493><s%> was before <S%H834><s%> you.

"But I will settle <S%H3427><s%> him in My house <S%H1004><s%> and in My kingdom <S%H4438><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and his throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>"' "

According to all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> and according to all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> vision, <S%H2377><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> Nathan <S%H5416><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>

Then David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> am I, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and what <S%H4310><s%> is my house <S%H1004><s%> that Thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> me this <S%H1988><s%> far <S%H1988><s%>?

"And this <S%H2088><s%> was a small <S%H6994><s%> thing <S%H6994><s%> in Thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> but Thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> of Thy servant's house <S%H1004><s%> for a great <S%H7350><s%> while <S%H7350><s%> to come, <S%H7350><s%> and hast regarded <S%H7200><s%> me according to the standard <S%H8447><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> of high <S%H4609><s%> degree, <S%H4609><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

"What <S%H4100><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> can David <S%H1732><s%> still <S%H5750><s%> [say] to Thee concerning the honor <S%H9202><s%> [bestowed] on Thy servant <S%H5650><s%>? For Thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> Thy servant. <S%H5650><s%>

"O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for Thy servant's sake, <S%H5668><s%> and according to Thine own heart, <S%H3820><s%> Thou hast wrought <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> greatness, <S%H1420><s%> to make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these great <S%H1420><s%> things. <S%H1420><s%>

"O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Thee, neither <S%H369><s%> is there <S%H369><s%> any God <S%H430><s%> besides <S%H2108><s%> Thee, according to all <S%H3605><s%> that we have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears. <S%H241><s%>

"And what <S%H4310><s%> one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> is like Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to redeem <S%H6299><s%> for Himself [as] a people, <S%H5971><s%> to make <S%H7760><s%> Thee a name <S%H8034><s%> by great <S%H1420><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> things, <S%H3372><s%> in driving <S%H1644><s%> out nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou didst redeem <S%H6299><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

"For Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> Thou didst make <S%H5414><s%> Thine own people <S%H5971><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> didst become <S%H1961><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

"And now, <S%H6258><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> let the word <S%H1697><s%> that Thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as Thou hast spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

"And let Thy name <S%H8034><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> [even] a God <S%H430><s%> to Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee.'

"For Thou, O my God, <S%H430><s%> hast revealed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H241><s%> to Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> that Thou wilt build <S%H1129><s%> for him a house; <S%H1004><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> [courage] to pray <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee.
"And now, <S%H6258><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou art God, <S%H430><s%> and hast promised <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> good <S%H9186><s%> thing <S%H9186><s%> to Thy servant. <S%H5650><s%>

"And now <S%H6258><s%> it hath pleased <S%H2974><s%> Thee to bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> that it may continue <S%H1961><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee; for Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> hast blessed, <S%H1288><s%> and it is blessed <S%H1288><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>"
